TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCTransitionRotoZoom extends Cocos2D.CCTransitionScene

Docs.summary: <para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTransitionRotoZoom" />: Rotate and zoom out the outgoing scene, and then rotate and zoom in the incoming. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTransitionRotoZoom" />

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnEnter() cil managed

Docs.summary: Event callback that is invoked every time when enters the 'stage'. If the enters the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition starts. During onEnter you can't access a "sister/brother" node. If you override onEnter, you shall call its parent's one, e.g., Node::onEnter().
Docs.remarks: <para>Event callback that is invoked every time when <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> enters the 'stage'. If the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /> enters the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition starts. During onEnter you can't access a "sister/brother" node. If you override onEnter, you shall call its parent's one, e.g., <ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_node_1a35211ff3db90acb4bca5d92edd6f3dde" kindref="member">Node::onEnter()</ref>. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCNode" /><ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_node_1a35211ff3db90acb4bca5d92edd6f3dde" kindref="member">Node::onEnter()</ref>
